name: Midnight: Submersion Nightmare Horror Story Prologue
name_original: Midnight: Submersion Nightmare Horror Story Prologue
description:
Midnight Submersion: Nightmare Horror Story Prologue -The first location is available for the passing. You are offered to play as the main character and you do not have any restrictions for exploring the area.
Try to get what is going on there!
Actions have been started in a lost place which is surrounded by the forest.
The city was covered by darkness. The night is full of silence. The atmosphere is creepy.
Some thoughts in mind: who am I? where am I? Is it an abduction? No, it could not be for real, I should be bound. We have already started to explore the surrounding area. All people are gone, they have lost personal stuff that could remind us about their existence.
What is going on here? Is it a silhouette into a thin mist?
When we started to be closer, we get that it is a dummy. A lot of questions and without any answers.
Dummies can move and it's terrible!
Which kind of creatures are they? Runaway - only one thing that should I think about right now! Something weird is happening here.
Will the place let us go? This is only the beginning, we should understand what would happen next.
It is an attractive horror\thriller game from the first face with some elements of a puzzle game and epic storyline.
You have just woken up in a mysterious house. It's night outside.
You do not remember how did you get into the house.
The note is laying on the stand.
One thing that you know is the Brewding laboratory.
You do not understand what is going on here.
You have a flashlight.
You feel weak and you should explore the countryside. Try to find food and a battery.
The only thing that you could meet in the countryside is dummies. Some of them are aggressive and may attack you. You should know who is your enemy and who would help you.
They are living their own life and your presence is unpleasant.
The mission is to understand what does this organization means and what do they hide.
Try to get out of this place and nobody knows what would happen next.
Main game features:
- Breathtaking plot;
When you do not understand why are you in so mysterious place, you should start to recognize the all details to make the chronology of developments.
- Creepy atmosphere;
Silence and strange developments feel like a nightmare but its real.
- Location with the particular qualities;
Explore each location to find the answers! It is not so easy to find the right way of leaving.
- Curious puzzle game;
Not explored location full of dummies. You have an amnesia! Start to find the hints!
- It is night time on the streets
